name: Carmelita Henley
text: Service is amazing. Always have had kind and efficient servers. Cozy neighborhood vibe. Prices are very reasonable and the food is great! I'd recommend the spicy buffalo chicken sandwich and all the pizzas are amazing.

name: Jacob Miller
text: Nice staff. The place is a bit run down though. Pizza was a bit greasy too. Salad bar was okay. They have a cool soda machine.

name: Robert Roberts
text: I try to go here every couple weeks with my dad. Always tastes great and when you ask for a topping they cover your pizza in it. Most places just tease me with the toppings barely putting any on. All ingredients taste very fresh including the dough.

name: Jennifer parks
text: Best pizza place. Will recommend this place for anyone wanting pizza. Manager came to table and showed us how to flip the dough. Kids enjoyed watching.

name: Jayne Marin
text: Best pizza hands down.  All fresh & kid friendly.  Manager came to our table & showed our kids how to make a pizza.  Love it.  We order from them all the time.

name: Alvin Jackson
text: Best pizza I've ever tasted. Has fresh ingredients that you can really taste. My kids love it.

name: Mark S
text: While the taste of the pizza is above average for "prison food Santa Clarita", this food is way overpriced. I ordered 2 "large" pizzas (what a joke 14" is large here) a dozen wings and some breadsticks and my bill was $52! His food cost? …More

name: David Anguiano
text: The best pizza I've had in a while!!! Love the way the hand toss it right in front of u n the freshes ingredients and the sauce was incredible. The manager even came and showed the family how to toss a pizza!!!! I liked the way he took his time to see how the food was. I highly recommend the pizza factory

name: Sandra Lopez
text: Amazing pizza with a lot of flavor. Which ever toppings u add, they make sure they over load the pizza with it. To bad it is expensive a bit. Worth to try it that's for sure

name: Husam Salman
text:
Soooooooooo Gooooooood!!!

This place is awesome and I want to let people know that they should definitely …More

name: Matt Mason
text: Terrible service. I got there 2 mins before the lunch specials ended. I was looking at the menu and then when I went to place my order they stated the lunch specials were over 2 mins ago. Really?

name: Gamester Account
text: Poor service all I can say.

name: Holli Ryan-Kalaleh
text: Good little place with tasty pizzas and salads.

name: Keith Magee
text: Best pizza in town.   Great toppings.

name: IceCream
text: The pizza is the best so is everything else

name: Stef Torres
text: I thought I ordered a fettuccini Alfredo, but instead I got spaghetti noodles covered in melted cheese!!! No sauce just sticky noodles of cheese!! First time trying and never again!

name: trashguy
text: Great pizza

name: Luke Woolley
text: Large pizza cost $24 and the dough was unbaked--stringy raw dough throughout. Plus the bacon was entirely fat. I ate 1 piece and it made me sick; I wont be back.

name: Pat Vil
text: This place is tastey and yummy!

name: Estela Cruz
text:
(Translated by Google) Mmm very rich and calm!
I recommend it! …More
